metadata.Title: CVE-2017-7651 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
In Eclipse Mosquitto 1.4.14, a user can shutdown the Mosquitto serversimply by filling the RAM memory with a lot of connections with largepayload. This can be done without authentications if occur in connectionphase of MQTT protocol.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7651` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmosquitto0 - 0.15-2+deb7u3ubuntu0.1
libmosquittopp0 - 0.15-2+deb7u3ubuntu0.1
mosquitto - 0.15-2+deb7u3ubuntu0.1
mosquitto-clients - 0.15-2+deb7u3ubuntu0.1
python-mosquitto - 0.15-2+deb7u3ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.15-2+deb7u3ubuntu0.1').
